title: Suspected gunman’s search for Ukraine fighters was ‘no help,’ former volunteer says
content: The Trump golf course suspect described himself as a defender of Ukraine and Taiwan. But a former representative of Ukraine’s International Legion said he was all talk.
summary: The Trump golf course suspect described himself as a defender of Ukraine and Taiwan. But a former representative of Ukraine’s International Legion said he was all talk.

title: Candidate hits opponent with chair during live TV debate
content: José Luiz Datena slammed a chair into opponent Pablo Marçal at the São Paulo mayoral debate. Marçal’s aides said he was diagnosed with a fractured rib.
summary: José Luiz Datena slammed a chair into opponent Pablo Marçal at the São Paulo mayoral debate. Marçal’s aides said he was diagnosed with a fractured rib.

title: Death toll rises in European floods; more severe weather expected
content: At least 12 people have died in floods in central Europe, including in Romania, Poland, Austria and the Czech Republic, according to officials.
summary: At least 12 people have died in floods in central Europe, including in Romania, Poland, Austria and the Czech Republic, according to officials.

title: Gripped by despair, Israel’s hostage families try to keep hope alive
content: “There is a rope hanging over my son’s head,” said Yehuda Cohen, father of hostage Nimrod Cohen. He says the U.S. must pressure Netanyahu into a cease-fire.
summary: “There is a rope hanging over my son’s head,” said Yehuda Cohen, father of hostage Nimrod Cohen. He says the U.S. must pressure Netanyahu into a cease-fire.

title: China frees U.S. pastor after nearly two decades, State Department says
content: California pastor David Lin was charged with fraud by Chinese authorities while active in a religious movement. The United States says that he was wrongfully detained.
summary: California pastor David Lin was charged with fraud by Chinese authorities while active in a religious movement. The United States says that he was wrongfully detained.

title: ‘Sprinkled with our blood’: Why so many Ukrainians resist land for peace
content: Ukraine is under pressure to cut a deal to end the war, especially if Trump wins, but these soldiers in the east are not ready to give up land.
summary: Ukraine is under pressure to cut a deal to end the war, especially if Trump wins, but these soldiers in the east are not ready to give up land.

title: Hunger still stalks Gaza
content: “I’ve never seen a crisis like this in my 25 years in humanitarian work,” a U.N. World Food Program regional director said of the increasingly insecure situation in Gaza.
summary: “I’ve never seen a crisis like this in my 25 years in humanitarian work,” a U.N. World Food Program regional director said of the increasingly insecure situation in Gaza.

title: Houthis fire missile from Yemen into central Israel, warn of more strikes
content: Israeli forces said the missile Sunday did not cause any direct injuries, but Netanyahu threatens, “we exact a heavy price for any attempt to harm us.”
summary: Israeli forces said the missile Sunday did not cause any direct injuries, but Netanyahu threatens, “we exact a heavy price for any attempt to harm us.”

title: 6 killed, thousands evacuated as storm batters Central and Eastern Europe
content: Four died in Romania and one in Poland, and a firefighter in Austria was killed responding to floods. The storm is expected to linger over Europe for days.
summary: Four died in Romania and one in Poland, and a firefighter in Austria was killed responding to floods. The storm is expected to linger over Europe for days.

title: Paris closes out its Olympic summer with dazzling Champions Parade
content: The Champions Parade for the Paris Olympic and Paralympic Games included a march down the Champs-Élysées and a medal ceremony led by President Emmanuel Macron.
summary: The Champions Parade for the Paris Olympic and Paralympic Games included a march down the Champs-Élysées and a medal ceremony led by President Emmanuel Macron.

title: Indigenous Colombian coca company challenges Coca-Cola’s trademark
content: Coca Nasa, the producer of Coca Pola, or coca beer, says it’s motivated by what it claims is bullying by the beverage giant.
summary: Coca Nasa, the producer of Coca Pola, or coca beer, says it’s motivated by what it claims is bullying by the beverage giant.

title: Taliban begins enforcing new draconian laws, and Afghan women despair
content: Afghan religious police wield new power to enforce a ban on women raising their voices in public and looking at men other than their husbands or relatives.
summary: Afghan religious police wield new power to enforce a ban on women raising their voices in public and looking at men other than their husbands or relatives.
